info.title: E-commerce API
info.description: API documentation for the E-commerce project

get.summary: Get all categories
Get My categories
Get a category by ID

error.example: You cannot update category with associated products.
You are not authorized to delete this Category.

get.summary: Order categories by a specific column

error.example: Invalid column or direction or parameters

get.summary: Order My categories by a specific column

error.example: Invalid column or direction or parameters

get.summary: Retrieve contact information by user ID

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to retrieve contact information for

parameters.name: contact_information_id
parameters.description: The ID of the contact information to delete

delete.summary: Delete all contacts for the authenticated user

400.description: Contacts not found for this user

message.example: Contacts not found for this user

error.example: Your email activation code is invalid

get.summary: Send an email verification code to the user

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: User's email to send the verification code to

message.example: The activation code has been sent to your email

post.description: Create a new expression with product_id,id for auth user, and an optional action

get.summary: Get product expressions including views, likes, and dislikes
get.description: Returns the number of views, likes, dislikes, and the list of users who interacted with the product.

put.summary: Update user expression for a product
put.description: Allows a user to update their expression (like or dislike) for a specific product.

404.description: User has not expressed for this product

message.example: User not expressed for this product

get.summary: Get all offers

error.example: You are not authorized to create this Offer.

Get a offer by ID

description.example: A high-end smartphone with excellent features and a sleek design

You are not authorized to delete this Offer.

error.example: Invalid column or direction or parameters

get.summary: Get all products

description.example: This is a new Perform and it's cool Try it
A high-end smartphone with excellent features and a sleek design.

error.example: You are not authorized to add this product.

get.summary: Get My products
Get a single product by ID

schema.example: This is a new Perform and it's cool Try it

You are not authorized to delete this product.

get.summary: Get all users with their contact information

200.description: Successful retrieval of users and their contact details

email-verification.example: An activation code has been sent to your email

error.example: your email address is not verified

get.summary: Get user profile by user ID

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to retrieve the profile for

200.description: Successful retrieval of user profile and contact details

message.example: Validation error or incorrect old password
You are not authorized to modify this profile

error.example: You are not authorized to create this warehouse .
